messages.content: We need to ramp up our Meta ad variant production — currently we're bottlenecked at 10-15 new variants per week and need to get to 50+

I can help you scale your Meta ad variant production significantly! To build the right creative engine, I need to understand your current setup:

1. What are your top-performing ad formats? (static images, carousels, video?)
2. Which product features drive the best conversion — Cash Out, Balance Shield, or Early Pay?
3. Do you have a library of approved brand assets and copy I can train on?

Static images perform best for us on Meta. Cash Out is our hero feature — 'get paid today' messaging drives the most installs. We have 2 years of ad performance data and our brand guidelines PDF is uploaded.

Excellent! Based on your data, I'll build a creative engine focused on:

- High-volume static image variants for Meta (1080x1080)
- Cash Out urgency messaging as the primary angle
- Balance Shield and Early Pay as secondary angles
- Multiple copy/visual combinations for daily A/B testing

I've created the asset request for 50 Meta Performance Ad Variants. First batch of 15 will be ready for review next week. You can track progress on the project page.
We're launching our first brand TV campaign — need help concepting a 30-second spot that introduces EarnIn to people who've never heard of us

A brand TV debut is exciting! To create something truly impactful, I want to understand your vision:

1. What emotion should viewers feel after watching — empowerment, relief, hope?
2. Do you want to show the app directly, or keep it more lifestyle/story-driven?
3. Any existing TV spots from competitors you admire or want to differentiate from?
